treatment-md.title: Chromaphyosemion omega Sonnenberg, 2007, sp. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: Description of three new species of the genus Chromaphyosemion Radda, 1971 (Cyprinodontiformes: Nothobranchiidae) from the coastal plains of Cameroon with a preliminary review of the Chromaphyosemion splendopleure complex.
